language.title: Language
language.description: Choose which language you want to use in Zispr.

languageSelectedToast.title: Language updated!
languageSelectedToast.description: The interface has been changed to {language}.

yourAccount.title: Your Account
yourAccount.description: Manage your account information, like password and profile details.

item.title: Your Account
item.description: View your account information and manage your settings.

privacyAndSafety.title: Privacy and Safety
privacyAndSafety.description: Control how Zispr uses your information and who can see your content.

item.title: Privacy and safety
item.description: Manage your privacy and safety settings.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Select the kinds of notifications you get about your activities, interests, and recommendations.

contentAndDisplay.title: Content and Display
contentAndDisplay.description: Manage your collections, accessibility, display, and languages.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Manage your collections of saved posts.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose which language to use in Zispr.

emptyFollowing.title: Your timeline is a bit empty...
emptyFollowing.description: Find people to follow and see their posts here!

empty.title: Nothing to see here... yet
empty.description: When posts are made, they will appear here.

impressions.label: Impressions
impressions.tooltip: The number of times this post was seen.

engagements.label: Engagements
engagements.tooltip: Total number of times users have interacted with this post (likes, comments, retweets).

profileVisits.label: Profile visits
profileVisits.tooltip: The number of times your profile was visited from this post.

supporter.title: Become a Supporter
supporter.description: Support Zispr to get exclusive benefits and help the platform grow!
supporter.pageDescription: We are finalizing the details for you to support Zispr! Your contribution will be fundamental to keep the platform running and growing.

basic.name: Basic Supporter
basic.description: For those who want to take the first step and help the platform grow.

vip.name: VIP Supporter
vip.description: For enthusiasts who want an enhanced experience and early access.

patron.name: Patron Supporter
patron.description: For visionaries who believe in Zispr's full potential.

founder.title: Founder and CEO of Zispr
founder.description: This is the account of the founder of Zispr. Follow for updates on the development and future of the platform.

official.title: Official Account
official.description: This is the official account of Zispr. Keep an eye out for announcements, tips, and important platform updates.

official_en.title: Official Account
official_en.description: This is the official Zispr account for the United States. Keep an eye out for announcements, tips, and important platform updates.

supporter.title: Supporter
supporter.description: This user supports Zispr and helps keep the platform running. Thank you!

block.hasBlockedYou: You have been blocked by this user.
block.isBlockedDescription: You can't see or follow @{handle}'s posts

posts.title: No posts yet
posts.description: When this user posts, their posts will appear here.

replies.title: No replies yet
replies.description: When this user replies to others, their replies will appear here.

media.title: No media yet
media.description: When this user posts photos or videos, they will appear here.

likes.title: No liked posts yet
likes.description: When this user likes posts, they will appear here.

privateLikes.title: Likes are private
privateLikes.description: {handle} has chosen to keep their likes private.

deletePost.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deletePost.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your post from our servers.

block.title: Block {handle}?
block.description: They will not be able to follow or message you, and you will not see notifications from them.

unblock.title: Unblock {handle}?
unblock.description: They will be able to follow you and see your posts.

imageSize.title: Image too large
imageSize.description: Please select an image smaller than 10MB.

saveSuccess.title: Profile Saved!
saveSuccess.description: Your changes have been saved successfully.

saveError.title: Failed to Save
saveError.description: Could not save your profile changes. Please try again.

comingSoon.title: Coming soon!
comingSoon.description: This feature will be added soon.
comingSoon.highlights: The ability to add posts to highlights will be added soon.
comingSoon.notInterested: This feature will be added soon.
comingSoon.report: This feature will be added soon.
comingSoon.viewEngagements: This feature will be added soon.
comingSoon.communityNote: This feature will be added soon.
